response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to me, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and the time invested in its creation. Considering its immense value to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it at this very price. I believe this is an opportunity for us both to benefit from a transaction that aligns perfectly with our interests. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 15000}
